title: [1.8.1]buildcraft 更新至2.2.5
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-12-4 23:07 编辑 

BuildCraft 2.2.5 – even better SMP作者：SpaceToad
BuildCraft 2.2.5 (stable)SMP client and SSP:buildcraft-client-A-core-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-client-B-transport-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-client-B-factory-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-client-B-builders-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-client-B-energy-2.2.5.zipSMP server:buildcraft-server-A-core-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-server-B-transport-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-server-B-factory-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-server-B-builders-2.2.5.zipbuildcraft-server-B-energy-2.2.5.zip
即将推出BuildCraft 3.0.0
http://v.minecraftxz.com/player.swf?ID=KUOE-eFLh18So after a long time dedicated to fixing bugs and SMP, I finally reserved some time to new feature implementations. While initially planning to give additional work at the Builders part of the package, I got hooked playing with various requests that have been made about detector pipes and such.But detector pipes are boring. So what I did instead is a flexible generalized detection platform, able to detect all kind of events (including items passing through pipes of course, but also chests state, tanks, machines) supported by a comprehensive multiplexed signal system. Here comes BuildCraft 3.0.0!




BuildCraft 2.2.4 – Fixing one SMP bug
http://v.minecraftxz.com/player.swf?ID=ejboP-04iIk
需要 ModLoader1.8.1 ModLoaderMp+1.8.1 MinecraftForge 1.1.2
BuildCraft 2.2.4 (beta)SMP client and SSP:客户端buildcraft-client-A-core-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-client-B-transport-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-client-B-factory-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-client-B-builders-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-client-B-energy-2.2.4.zipSMP server:服务端buildcraft-server-A-core-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-server-B-transport-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-server-B-factory-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-server-B-builders-2.2.4.zipbuildcraft-server-B-energy-2.2.4.zip

http://v.minecraftxz.com/player.swf?ID=dhrL6_n5dhU
[yellow_wool]下载


BuildCraft 2.2.2 (beta)SMP client and SSP:buildcraft-client-A-core-2.2.2.zipbuildcraft-client-B-transport-2.2.2.zipbuildcraft-client-B-factory-2.2.2.zipbuildcraft-client-B-builders-2.2.2.zipbuildcraft-client-B-energy-2.2.2.zip
需要ModLoader1.8.1， ModLoaderMp+1.8.1，MINECRAFT FORGE
[lime_wool]1.7.3 oldhttp://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=9176&highlight=BUILDCRAF
支持自定义的管道纹理

以下是新增物品：


[lime_wool]管道部分[lime_wool]


Pipe waterproof - base of waterproof pipe crafting
制作水管的材料


Wooden waterproof pipe - extracts liquids from tanks
木制水管-提取容器的液体


Cobblestone waterproof pipe - transports liquids
鹅卵石水管-输送液体


Stone waterproof pipe - transports liquids
石材水管-输送液体


Iron waterproof pipe - allow to direct liquids to a certain direction
铁水管 - 控制液体的方向


Golden waterproof pipe - transports liquids more efficiently
金水管 - 快速输送液体


Wooden conductive pipe - extracts power from engines
木导电管 - 提取功率从发动机


Stone conductive pipe - transports power
石导电管 - 输送电力


Golden conductive pipe - transports power more efficiently
金导电管 - 输送功率更有效地
为啥木有铁导电管


[cyan_wool]机械部分[cyan_wool]


Tank - stores liquid容器


Pump - pumps liquids underneath
水泵-只采下方液体


Refinery - refines oil into fuel.
炼油器 - 提炼成燃料的石油。




快捷下载        buildcraft2.2.2.zip

已含buildcraft-client-A-core-2.2.0.zip，buildcraft-client-B-transport-2.2.0.zip，buildcraft-client-B-factory-2.2.0.zip，buildcraft-client-B-builders-2.2.0.zip，buildcraft-client-B-energy-2.2.0.zip
未含ModLoader1.8.1， ModLoaderMp+1.8.1，MINECRAFT FORGE
